trends: There has been one other sighting in North Branford
There were no other sightings in North Branford on or around January 7th 1997
Summary: huge oval yellow orange light hovering about car windshield taking up whole view
divs: sighting detailsi was 4 years old and i will never ever forget this, my first ufo encounter and it was surely one for the record books, i was with my mom and dad and they remember it but arent as enthused as me about it. i was in the back seat in the middle, pulling into out condo street\ driveway, when the entire windshiels was obstructed by a massive yellow \ orange oval solid ball, it was bright but didnt hurt my eyes, and next thing i knew we were pulled into the parking space..... it was just unreal and a gift from god ill get to cherish and always have cherished... i believe we got abducted because i know nothing from the time we pulled in till when we were parked and its a good 60 yards..
